thread.section_title: AMOMA.com Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von AMOMA.com | www.amoma.com | 5 von 402
thread.title: Joyce Sally

author: Joyce Sally
title: Joyce Sally
text: Hotel had absolutely no record of our booking despite Amoma debiting our account for the full amount. We were given a room but hotel said that they'd need our card details in case Amoma didn't pay them at all. Has been a battle to get any info from Amoma or any explanation. I'd avoid this company at all costs. Additionally, I booked through Topcashback - they've declined my cashback despite it being a bona fide booking. Use the other hotel sites, you know the ones, tried and tested but avoid this one...
